title: 1.7.10版本怎么编辑无尽合成表？
author: 苍穹空
txt_content: MineTweaker3，MineTweaker2，MineTweakerRecipeMaker都有装，会改普通合成表，但是不知道怎么编辑无尽合成表（9*9的那个），而我又看到有人修改了，有没有人能告诉我为什么，如果要改配置文件的话怎么改？如果还缺点什么能不能把链接挂上？谢谢啦

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
苍穹空 发表于 2020-3-31 19:38
往哪加？（什么都不懂）
.minecraft/scripts里 创建一个后缀.zs的文件

用记事本打开 粘贴进去 保存

合成需要的物品你自己改就行了

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content: 例子 添加合成的mods.avaritia.ExtremeCrafting.addShaped("SKULLFIRESWORD", <avaritia:skullfire_sword> * 1, [[null, null, null, null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>], [null, null, null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:1>],[null, null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null],[null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null, null],[null, <extrabotany:material:8>, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null, null, null],[null, null, <extrabotany:material:8>, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null, null, null, null],[null, null, <avaritia:block_resource>, <extrabotany:material:8>, null, null, null, null, null],[null, <avaritia:block_resource>, null, null, <extrabotany:material:8>, null, null, null, null],[<avaritia:endest_pearl>, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null]]);复制代码

replies.txt_content:
